title: ‘Still Some Work To Do’: Remco Evenepoel Racing into Unknown in Dauphiné Injury Comeback
content:
Soudal Quick-Step star tempers expectation for Critérium du Dauphiné in crucial test ahead of 'Big 4' battle at Tour de France.

Read the full article at ‘Still Some Work To Do’: Remco Evenepoel Racing into Unknown in Dauphiné Injury Comeback on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
